home.title: Sexual Repression Index Calculator
home.description: A professional sexual psychological health self-assessment tool based on multiple validated psychometric scales, helping you scientifically understand your sexual psychological characteristics and promote sexual health and intimate relationship development.
home.adaptiveDesc: The system automatically selects the most suitable scale combination based on your age and personal background, providing specialized protection mechanisms for adolescents aged 14-17, and culturally sensitive assessment content for users without sexual experience, ensuring everyone receives accurate and appropriate assessment experience.
home.versionDesc: We offer two assessment versions. You can choose based on your available time and desired level of detail
home.quickVersionDesc: Suitable for first-time users and quick understanding
home.fullVersionDesc: More comprehensive and in-depth professional analysis
home.scientificBasisDesc: Based on internationally recognized psychometric scales, rigorously validated scientific tools
home.dualControlDesc: Based on Janssen et al.'s SIS/SES dual control model, measuring sexual inhibition and sexual excitation systems
home.sexualGuiltDesc: Using Mosher's Sexual Guilt Scale to assess sex-related guilt feelings and moral burden
home.sexualShameDesc: Using KISS-9 scale to measure sex-related shame experiences and self-acceptance
home.sexualOpinionDesc: SOS scale assesses emotional orientation towards sexual stimuli and approach-avoidance tendencies
home.privacyTitle: Your Privacy is Our Top Priority
home.privacyDesc: All assessment data is processed and stored locally on your device only, never uploaded to any server. You have complete data control and can delete or export your assessment history at any time.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Sexual Psychological Health Journey?
home.ctaDesc: Through scientific self-assessment, better understand yourself and promote healthy sexual psychological development and intimate relationships.
home.footerDesc: Science-based Sexual Repression Index Calculator to help you better understand your sexual psychological health.
home.copyright: Â© 2025 Sexual Repression Index Calculator. For educational and self-understanding purposes only, not a replacement for professional mental health services.

scales.sisSesDesc: Dual control model scale developed by Janssen et al., measuring sexual inhibition and sexual excitation systems
